text: Lee Sang-hyeok (; born 19 January 2000) is a South Korean footballer currently playing as a midfielder for Pardubice. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== . {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |rowspan="2"|Pardubice |2018–19 |rowspan="2"|Fortuna národní liga |8||0||0||0||0||0||8||0 |- |2019–20 |8||0||0||0||0||0||0||0 |- ! colspan="3" |Career total !16!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!8!!0 |} ;Notes ==References== Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:South Korean footballers Category:South Korean expatriate footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Czech National Football League players Category:Daegu FC players Category:FK Pardubice players Category:South Korean expatriate sportspeople in the Czech Republic Category:Expatriate footballers in the Czech Republic
title: Lee Sang-hyeok (footballer)
